import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import {RxCalendar} from "react-icons/rx" import {BsShieldCheck} from "react-icons/bs" import {BsBookmarkCheck} from "react-icons/bs" import Aos from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css" function Info(){ //UseEffect to set animation duration ==> useEffect(() =>{ Aos.init({duration: 2000}) }, []) return (

Travel to make memories all around the world

Book & Relax

You can also call airlines from your phone and book a flight ticket!

Smart Checklist

You can also call airlines from your phone and book a flight ticket!

Save More

You can also call airlines from your phone and book a flight ticket!

) } export default Info;
